text.title: Introduction to rurals comunities
text.p: First of all wellcome! You are visiting my TWEB project. This web application aim to be a mean to bring new life to rurals comunities providing a place on the internet for the citizens of country side's town to share needs, goods and services. This project also bring visibility around events and attraction provided by a rural area.

The web-app will not only increase tourism but will surely increase the overall citizens quality of life allowing people to chose between providing and/or requesting a service or a good produced within the rural area. This could be seen as a way to modernize barter and simplyfing the managing of the population.

That's all you need to know, and all there is to say about this project, nothing too fancy... yet. The following lines are going to be random generated words just to fill some space on the main page. Obviously future articles will be longer than this one. If there would even be anything like a "future" for this web application. Have fun!
